dict.acceptation: 间隔；幕间休息；（数学）区间；

sent.orig: In statistics a confidence interval (CI) is an interval estimate of a population parameter.
sent.trans: 在统计学里，置信区间指的是对于某一群体参数的区间估计。

sent.orig: Drag this Interval marker to a Timeline shape and then choose Configure Interval.
sent.trans: 将此间隔标记拖到时间线形状上，然后选择“配置间隔”。

sent.orig: A harmonic interval is the interval between two notes sounded simultaneously.
sent.trans: 同时发声的两个音之间的音程为和声音程。

sent.orig: A melodic interval is the interval between two notes sounded in succession, as in a melody.
sent.trans: 旋律音程为在旋律中先后发声的两个音之间的音程。

sent.orig: In the method time interval coupling pair decoupling substitutes time interval decoupling during the optimizing prose.
sent.trans: 为此，该文提出偶对优化潮流方法，在优化过程中，用时段偶对解耦替代时段解耦。
